children.message: My friend thinks he is smart. He told me an onion is the only food that makes you cry, so I threw a coconut at his face
I went to Bank of America to deposit a check, and they asked me for ID. I said, “Are you telling me other people are trying to put money into my account and you’re telling them no?
What did the fish say when he swam into a wall? Dam.
You're amazing and everything you do will make a positive effect on the world
